full_summary:
=====================================


### Announcement: Purchasing Consultancy Services

The following announcement pertains to a **cancelled** procurement notice for purchasing consultancy services that that was posted on [Publication Date](#_EN578-222504ทานB - 2022-08-23.

#### Details

| **Field** | **Value** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | EN578-222504/B | Unique identifier for the procurement notice |
| Tender Closing Date | September 21, 2022, 14:00:00 | Deadline for submission of proposals |
| Goods and Services Identifier (GSIN) | R019Q | Marine-related consultancy services |
| Trade Agreements | Multiple | Report below for applicable agreements |
| Regions of Delivery | Multiple |  | List below for applicable regions. |


**Primary contact**
Jason Kwan
Phone: (613) 415-7797
Email: [jason.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jason.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Address: Public Works and Government Services Canada
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Canada


**Trade Agreements:**
The procurement notice is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Regions of Distribution**

The successful bidder is required to operate within the following regions:
    • Alberta
    • Quebec (except NCR)
    • Regional Capital (RCN)
    • Ontario (except RCN)
    • Prince Edward Island
    • Northwest Territories
    • New Brunswick
    • British Columbia
    • Newfoundland and Labrador
    • Nova Scotia
    • Nunavut Territory
    • Manitoba
    • Yukon
    • Saskatchewan

The procurement pressure has been **canceled**. The individual can contact Jason Kwan at [jason.k
